colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NAM MKHA'I SNYING PO LA SOGS PA'I 'KHOR THAMS CAD RAB TU DGA' STE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA 'DA' KA YE SHES ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
